name: @nortech/multi-aws-credentials
description: For use cases where aws cli profiles are not sufficient
author: joao@nortech.ai

scripts.test: ./index.ts add testprofile testid testsecret && ./index.ts replace testprofile testid2 testsecret && ./index.ts upsert testprofile testid2 testsecret && ./index.ts remove testprofile
scripts.install-locally: yarn build && yarn global add file:$(pwd)
